name: Hidden Object: Fairy Tale
summary: Hello, hidden object fans! Are you ready for the brand new hidden object story games? If you're a girl, then you'll enjoy becoming a real fairy tale princess in this awesome hidden object mystery! Welcome to the hidden object world of your imagination – you will discover enchanted things, beautiful fairies, and many other magical items in this Hidden Objects Fairy Tale! Download free and let the magic happen! The best fairy tale games are waiting for you!
